sentences.sContent: When they do, rule aficionados will say, “Well, we can emend it and make it more supple by adding to the circumstances it covers.
sentences.sContent_eng: When they do, rule aficionados will say, “Well, we can emend it and make it more supple by adding to the circumstances it covers.
sentences.sCn: 当发生这种情况的时候，爱好制定规则的人们就会说，“好吧，我们可以修订一下规则，让它能适应更多的环境。

sentences.sContent: It can avoid repeat manual word account and copy out when we emend teaching plan. It is important to enhance level of teaching management and work efficiency.
sentences.sContent_eng: It can avoid repeat manual word account and copy out when we emend teaching plan. It is important to enhance level of teaching management and work efficiency.
sentences.sCn: 该设计可以避免修订教学计划过程中反复人工计算、誊写的麻烦，对提高教学管理水平和工作效率有重要作用。

sentences.sContent: Firstly, based on the introduction of the developmental theories of real-estate, the dissertation puts forward the new developing styles and tries to make emend for the traditional theories.
sentences.sContent_eng: Firstly, based on the introduction of the developmental theories of real-estate, the dissertation puts forward the new developing styles and tries to make emend for the traditional theories.
sentences.sCn: 首先，本文在对城郊房地产大盘开发的基础理论铺垫介绍的基础上，提出了这种新的开发模式对传统房地产理论的修订；

remMethod.val: e(出) + mend(错误) → 找出错误 → 订正

trans.tranOther: to remove the mistakes from something that has been written
